articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Instantly Changes Into The Light Weapon Timegating After Complaints - Forbes
articles.description: The reaction was fast and furious from the Destiny 2 community when Bungie announced only half of its reprised “greatest hits” weapons would launch with Into the Light
